SEARCH
Package structures

Class ScheduleInstant

java.lang.Object
structures.ScheduleInstant
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<ScheduleInstant>
public class ScheduleInstant extends Object implements Comparable<ScheduleInstant>
The ScheduleInstant class represents an ISCTE-IUL time slot and date, a schedule time slot at a precise point in time.
Since:
1.0
